data.text:
@FlyerTalk FlyerTalk Saludos, para poderte ayudar por favor envianos por un DM tu numero de socio para poder ayudar.
Esperamos tu respuestas.
@JacobBrehme Hi, we are working on your case, as soon as we have more information about it, we will let you know. You can also check the status of your case here: https://t.co/CZE2G3ssi3. Regards.
@cazmajor We've replied through DM, regards.

@hedgedog5 Hi, sorry for not getting back to you sooner, in order to provide you a much better assistance, let us know your ticket number/booking reference along with the full passenger's name via DM. Bear in mind that some countries have imposed entry restrictions. Regards.

@GabeOneTwoOne Hola, si aún requieres de nuestra asistencia, envíanos a través de DM el código de reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 dígitos) y el nombre completo del pasajero. Te ofrecemos disculpas por el tiempo de respuesta. Quedamos atentos a tus comentarios. Saludos.

@C1Ferraz Olá, ate o atual momento, voos da Oceânia estão suspensos. Solicitamos o seu código de reserva por DM para que possamos verificar o status do seu voo. Ciente que também pode verificar pelo link https://t.co/5eXZRs34IB. Seguimos à disposição.

data.text: [IMPORTANT] We have received complaints about fake accounts on social networks contacting our clients. We will NEVER ask you for your secret passwords or your credit card number. We are reporting all cases and will continue protecting your security. https://t.co/QbZ5U2a27t
@DawnGonzales4RE Hello, in this case you'll receive the money to the same payment method you used. Do not hesitate to write us back in case you need our help. Regards.

@cristinaimacz Hello Cristina, we added your comments to your case; also, please rest assured that we are working hard to provide you a final response soon enough. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards.

@DawnGonzales4RE Hello, if you want to request the money instead of the voucher, you can go into the following link: https://t.co/gKRd6w9BDz, and follow the steps. Let us know if you require more assistance via DM. Kind regards.
@lee91704553 We apologize for the mistake, please fill out the form here: https://t.co/6L9uxsTkqs Regards.
@GeorgeMo George, we understand your position, that's why we encourage you to formalize your comments through the link below: https://t.co/zUhY79CJe9. Regards.

@lee91704553 Hello, we apologize for the time we have taken to answer. Regarding the link sent, it is an error that was corrected. We suggest you to try again, filling the form sent to complete the refund process. Feel free to write us for further assistance. Regards.
@GeorgeMo George, the case resolution was a definitive answer. Feel free to write us for further assistance. Regards.
@yasi_b Hi, we've sent you a response by DM. Our apologies for the delay in our response. Regards.
@fredcfreitas1 Hi, in order to check it please send us your booking code or ticket number by DM. We look forward to your response. Regards.
@melissayeagr Hi, if you need assistance with a Travel Voucher, you can send us your passport number and full name through a DM to verify in our records. Regards.

@LeoCast31617497 Hello, we verified that reservation code; however, it was purchased through a travel agency, in this case, you will have to contact them to request any modification/change/refund about it. Let us know if you have any other requirement. Kind regards.

@Lucas66839141 Hola, nuestra aerolínea se encuentra trabajando con los gobiernos locales, no obstante, si eres pasajero varado en el exterior puedes ingresar tus datos aquí: https://t.co/71MnWej3sa. Los vuelos especiales serán evaluados y autorizados por las autoridades del país. Saludos.

"
@degarrison Hi, we sent you more information through a DM. Regards.
@JacobBrehme We've provided you a response by DM. Regards.
@OdhnerRose Hello, please send via DM your booking code/ticket number to verify your available options. Our apologies for the delay in the response. We'll await your reply.

@vanessaG518 Hi, in order to check your flights and help you, please send us your booking code, ticket number and your full name by DM. Our apologies for the delay in our response. We'll be waiting for your message. Regards.
@fvidotousa Hi, we answered your DM. Regards.
@LLadalardo [+]Se não. Poderia nos informar o seu código de reserva via DM para que possamos analisar. Seguimos à disposição.

@LLadalardo Leonardo, boa tarde! Pedimos desculpas pela demora, no entanto, devido a alta demanda que estamos recebendo devido a atual situação, o tempo de espera está sendo maior que o estimado. Você conseguiu remarcar o seu voo?[+]

@caioramos021 Olá Caio, bom dia. Devido a atual situação, tivemos o aumento dos contatos em todos os nossos canais de atendimento. Sentimos muito pela demora. Deu tudo certo na viagem ou ainda precisa de auxílio?
@_barbaraim Hola, si aún requieres nuestra asistencia indícanos vía DM el número de ticket, nombre y apellido del pasajero. Te ofrecemos disculpas por el tiempo que tardamos en responder.

Going home is going back to where the heart is. We're proud to have taken more than 100,000 people back home. For them and for those who are still far away, we will keep on flying #FurtherTogether https://t.co/Dx1oM5XLlf
@JacobBrehme Hi, we've sent a response to you by DM. We apologize for the delay in our answers. Regards.
@mrjoemorgan Hi, we sent you more information through a DM. Regards.
@rodgon1190 Te hemos contestado el DM. Saludos.
@Alfie_1968 Hello, we sent a reply via DM. Regards.
@cazmajor Hi, we answered your DM. Regards.
@harrysbadhat Hi, we've sent a response through DM. We apologize for the delay in our answers. Regards.

data.text: @almostfreefamtr Hello, if your flight was affected but you don't know when to travel, manage your booking, here: https://t.co/FqYsNqoqVa  Si you won't be able to travel this year, you can request refund of your ticket, here:  https://t.co/iQwSrrHOu4
@seba_run If you need assistance with your tickets, do not hesitate to write us again, and do not forget to attach your booking code/ticket number. Kind regards.
@rodgon1190 Hola, bríndanos tu código de reserva o número de ticket vía DM. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta.

@seba_run Hello, if you still need assistance, please send via DM your booking code/ticket number. Also, confirm if you want to be assisted in English or Spanish. Our sincere apologies for the delay in the response. We'll await your reply.

@srtapontanarez Hello, if you still need assistance through this means, please send your booking code/ticket number via DM to verify your options. Our sincere apologies for the delay in the response. We'll await your information.

@irina_surilova Hello, if you still need assistance through this means, please send your booking code/ticket number via DM to verify your available options. Our sincere apologies for the time taken in bringing a reply. We'll await your information.
@avn1003 Hello Ana, you can request refund of your ticket, here:  https://t.co/iQwSrrHOu4
@LeoCast31617497 Hello Leo, we invite you to manage your booking here: https://t.co/HLT3qbDIWe
@wutangjules Hi, please send us a DM with the name of the passengers and ticket numbers. Regards.

@KimMaiTai Hello, due to the current situation and the high inquiries demand in our help centers, we couldn't assist you shortly. For that reason, we apologize. If you still need assistance, please write us back. Regards.
@lucykpick Remember that the authorization and execution of these special flights and the confirmation of the quotas, depends on the approval of the governments and local authorities. Kind regards.
@lucykpick Hi, due to the current situation and the high inquiries demand in our help centers, we couldn't assist you shortly, for that reason we apologize......
@JDoza29 Hello, we just sent you a message via DM, and we apologize for the delay. Kind regards.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @deben_osrs Hello, we apologize for the long time we took to reply, but due to the COVID-19 issue we have a high demand of requests; however, if you still need assistance, provide us the reservation code and full name of the passengers via DM. We'll be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.
@yasi_b Hi, if you still need our assistance, send us your booking code or ticket number alongside your full name by DM. Our apologies for the delay in our response. Regards.
@danielamour_ Hello, please send your booking code/ticket number through DM to verify your available options. We'll remain aware of your information.
@ilyakbos Hello, if you still need assistance, send us the booking code and your names via DM. We apologize for the delay in our response.
@joannemarieRD We've replied through DM, regards.

@PedroHGallegos Pedro, pedimos desculpas pela demora, no entanto, devido a alta demanda que estamos recebendo devido a atual situação, o tempo de espera está sendo maior que o estimado. Ainda podemos auxiliar? Nos envie seu código de reserva por DM. Seguimos à disposição.
@ladykaat1 Hello, we send you the link of our website: https://t.co/WqLwdCT01e where you can see the alternatives that you can choose. Best regards.

@Nat_reed17 Remember that the authorization and execution of these special flights and the confirmation of the quotas, depends on the approval of the governments and local authorities to bring back those who are still outside their countries. Kind regards.

@Nat_reed17 Hi, due to the current situation and the high inquiries demand in our help centers, we couldn't assist you shortly. If you still require assistance, fill the form to make your request, here: https://t.co/luYx3RKCSL....

@SolidVega Hello, due to the current situation and the high inquiries demand in our help centers, we couldn't assist you shortly. For that reason, we apologize. If you still need assistance, please write us back via DM with the reservation code and the passenger's full name. Regards.
@eIizabeast Hi, you can send us your booking code and full name through a DM, so we can give you assistance. Sorry for the delay in our response. Regards.
@ClaytonCts2 Hi, we've sent you a DM. We apologize for the delay in our answers. Regards.
@Scarlet18532508 Hi, our apologies for the delay on responding your query, we've replied to you via DM. Kind regards.
@LuzRios88 Hi, if you still need our assistance, send us your booking code or ticket number by DM. Our apologies for the delay in response. Regards.
@ranlovesrice Hi, send us your ticket number (13 digits) through a DM with your full name, so we can verify your information. We await your reply.

@Lucas66839141 Hola, si estás en una situación donde tengas la necesidad de regresar a tu país, por favor comunícate con el consulado de tu país. Te ofrecemos disculpas por el tiempo que hemos tomado en darte una respuesta. Quedamos atentos a cualquier otra inquietud. Saludos.

If you have a flight booked by April 30 and you cannot travel, don't worry. The amount you paid for your ticket will become personal credit for future travel up to December 31, 2020. Go to https://t.co/7I4nOM0CK5 https://t.co/uRxtgjA7jo

data.text: @Emmaaaaaax3 Hello, we do apologize for the long time we took to answer you, but due to the Covid-19 we have a high demand of passengers. If you still need our assistance, please send us via DM the complete passenger's name, the complete route, date off the flight and email address. Regards.
@nizzyszn Hola, te hemos escrito vía Dm. Saludos.
Even when everything shows us that we have to stop, someone must continue flying, so for you and for everyone today we say #TogetherFurther https://t.co/HvVQwfXKXN
@drlkong Hello, we sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.
@Cadogan90 Conor, please write us through DM, so we can provide you further information about your requirement. Regards.
@poppette_ Hello, we sent you a message via DM. Regards.
